Transvision Tawarkan Paket Nomat Rp62 Ribu per Bulan
03 Nov 2019, 10:43 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


(Dok. Transvision).

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- TransvisionÂ menawarkan paket NOMAT, inovasi produk untuk konsumen TV berlangganan di rumah. Lewat NOMAT, konsumen diberikan kebebasan penuh untuk menentukan channel yang ingin ditonton sebagai saluran favorit Anda dan keluarga.Mengusung ide #LANGGANANACARABARU, Transvision ingin membuah konsumen lebih happy. Selain bebas memilih channel favorit, konsumen yang sudah berlangganan juga dibebaskan untuk mengganti pilihannya setiap bulan sesuai dengan kebutuhan sehari-hari. "Ini belum pernah ada di paket manapun di Indonesia. Kami menyadari pilihan tontonan favorit masing-masing konsumen berbeda. Untuk itu, kami memberikan kesempatan, pelanggan kami bebas untuk memilih saluran yang ditonton," ujar Direktur Sales & Marketing Transvision Brando Tengdom. Lebih lanjut ia menjelaskan selain kebebasan memilih channel favorit dan menggantinya setiap bulan, NOMAT juga ditawarkan dengan harga relatif terjangkau, yaitu sekitar Rp62 ribu per bulan. Dengan biaya tersebut, konsumen akan mendapatkan tambahan 55 saluran lengkap, serta 10 saluran eksklusif milik Transmedia dan Transvision, saluran tv nasional, termasuk beberapa saluran hiburan lengkap lainnya. Brando menuturkan paket NOMAT sudah tersedia untuk calon pelanggan yang memerlukan tv berlangganan di rumah atau pun bagi Anda yang ingin mengganti tv berlangganan lamanya. "Nikmati hiburan tontonan favorit dengan cara lebih hemat. Dengan NOMAT, tentunya nonton menjadi lebih puas!" imbuh dia. Sebelumnya, Transvision telah meluncurkan channel Lingua, saluran eksklusif dengan format belajar bahasa asing, seperti Inggris, Mandarin, dan Jepang. Untuk dapat memasang paket berlangganan, Anda dapat langsung menemui tim Transvision di seluruh toko Transmart terdekat di kota Anda atau menghubungi layanan telelpon 1500060 atau WhatsApp ke 0823-0823-5050 setiap harinya.

Transvision Offers IDR 62,000 Nomato Package per Month
03 Nov 2019, 10:43 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


(Transvision Doc.)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Transvision offers NOMAT packages, product innovations for subscribed TV consumers at home. Through NOMAT, consumers are given full freedom to determine the channel you want to watch as your favorite channel and family. Carrying the idea #LANGGANANACARABARU, Transvision wants to make consumers happier. Besides being free to choose favorite channels, consumers who have subscribed are also freed to change their choices every month according to their daily needs. "This has never been in any package in Indonesia. We are aware of the favorite viewing choices for each different consumer. For that reason, we provide an opportunity, our customers are free to choose the channels to watch," said Transvision's Director of Sales & Marketing Brando Tengdom. He further explained that in addition to the freedom to choose favorite channels and change them every month, NOMAT is also offered at a relatively affordable price, which is around Rp62 thousand per month. With this fee, consumers will get an additional 55 complete channels, as well as 10 exclusive channels owned by Transmedia and Transvision, national TV channels, including several other complete entertainment channels. Brando said that the NOMAT package is available for prospective customers who need a TV subscription at home or for those of you who want to change your old TV subscription. "Enjoy the entertainment of your favorite shows in a more economical way. With NOMAT, of course watching will be more satisfied!" he added. Previously, Transvision had launched the Lingua channel, an exclusive channel with foreign language learning formats, such as English, Mandarin and Japanese. To be able to install a subscription package, you can directly meet the Transvision team in all the nearest Transmart stores in your city or contact the telephone service 1500060 or WhatsApp to 0823-0823-5050 every day.
